photorealistic.prompt:
Professional workspace with dual monitors, ergonomic setup, modern office environment.
Style: Photorealistic, cinematic, professional photography, 4K.
Mood: Professional, productive, organized.

Diverse team collaborating around a desk with laptops and notebooks.
Style: Photorealistic, candid, professional, 4K.
Mood: Collaborative, engaged, professional.

Professional person at desk typing on keyboard with focused expression.
Style: Photorealistic, detailed, professional photography, 4K.
Mood: Focused, productive, expert.

textbased.prompt:
Clean infographic with 3-4 key bullet points.
Style: Professional, minimalist design, high contrast.
Elements: Icons, text labels (28pt+), checkmarks.
Color: Professional blue and white.
Layout: Vertical, centered, organized.
Exclude: Photos, people, realistic imagery.

Professional data visualization with charts and metrics.
Style: Clean, modern, data-driven.
Elements: Bar charts, percentages, number displays.
Color: Professional palette with accent colors.
Text: Clear labels, readable fonts (24pt+).
Layout: Balanced, easy to read.
Exclude: Photos, people, gradients.
